title: All for the clan
content:
Exposition and Community Development
Through huge tournaments, events and partnerships, Mafia will become a cross-chain organization. In the future, Project RED Headquarters will be the home of all of our events.

Creating value
New big tools are coming in order to increase the value for our community & increase the Way3 Studio's leadership inside the ecosystem.

Aidrops
Building functionalities accross our airdrops to reward our stakers. Much more to discover during 2023...

A Brand
Through Merchandising & Strategic partnerships, mobsters can expect exclusive drops. First drop coming very soon.

title: Gaming experience
content:
Project Red
Join the Blood Arena's War and experience a fully immersive world in a merciless battle. Stronger, smarter, better, new activities & Game modes are coming to bring Mafia into a new space.

Win2Earn & Play2Earn
Across Project Red and new activities, be the strongest player and make even more money!

Real OG
Stakers and OGs are showing the confidence they have in the project. OGs are always rewarded... #AllForTheClan

Gaming development
Streaming, Tournaments, Esport, Partnerships & Collaborations. Let's propel Mafia into Gaming space.

title: THE EXPANSION
content:
Self financing organization
Implementing new experiences in MultiversX will bring us into a different dimension! DApp, Tools, advertising, into Project Red will generate passive incomes.

Cross-chains development
Mafia will grow through other blockchains thanks to huge collaborations and marketing! Way3 Studio will on-board more members & new cross-chain projects.

Whitepaper & Tokenomics
Let's enter in a new world, 2023 is for the Clan! Vote for a complete tokenomics and get ready to start!

Events
Let's show to everyone the power of the clan! Meet each other into real events...
